EmailTemplate.name: IBCS TRANSITION - Notification to GDS
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject} - New Airline Contacts: ETSP Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Service Providers,
Please find below the new contact details of the mentioned airline in the selected BSP country(ies).
Airline Name: {!Case.Account}
Airline Designator / Numeric Code: {!Account.Airline_designator__c} / {!Account.IATACode__c}
BSP Country Name(s): {!Case.BSPCountry__c}
(Insert Address)
(Insert Tel no)
(Insert Fax no.)
(Insert email id of BSP contact)
(Insert name of contact)
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Global Airline Participation Team
Industry Distribution and Financial Services
International Air Transport Association
33, Route de l'AÃ©roport
1215 Geneva 15 Airport
Switzerland
www.iata.org/customer
